get.description: Gets a list of all discussion items for a single issue.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: issue_iid
parameters.description: The IID of an issue

get.description: Returns a single discussion item for a specific project issue

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: issue_iid
parameters.description: The IID of an issue

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a discussion item

post.description: Creates a new thread to a single project issue. This is similar to creating a note but other comments (replies) can be added to it later.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: issue_iid
parameters.description: The IID of an issue

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of the thread

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, such as 2016-03-11T03:45:40Z (requires administrator or project/group owner rights)

post.summary: Add note to existing issue thread
post.description: Adds a new note to the thread. This can also create a thread from a single comment.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: issue_iid
parameters.description: The IID of an issue

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread note

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of the note/reply

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, such as 2016-03-11T03:45:40Z (requires administrator or project/group owner rights)

put.description: Modify existing thread note of an issue.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: issue_iid
parameters.description: The IID of an issue

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread note

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of the note/reply

delete.description: Deletes an existing thread note of an issue.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: issue_iid
parameters.description: The IID of an issue

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a discussion

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: The ID of a discussion note

get.summary: List project merge request discussion items
get.description: Gets a list of all discussion items for a single merge request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: merge_request_iid
parameters.description: The IID of a merge request

get.summary: Get single merge request discussion item
get.description: Returns a single discussion item for a specific project merge request

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: merge_request_iid
parameters.description: The IID of a merge request

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a discussion item

post.description: Creates a new thread to a single project merge request. This is similar to creating a note but other comments (replies) can be added to it later.

parameters.name: position[line_range][start]
parameters.description: Multiline note starting line

parameters.name: position[line_range][start][line_code]
parameters.description: Line code for the start line

parameters.name: position[line_range][start][type]
parameters.description: Use new for lines added by this commit, otherwise old.

parameters.name: position[line_range][end]
parameters.description: Multiline note ending line

parameters.name: position[line_range][end][line_code]
parameters.description: Line code for the end line

parameters.name: position[line_range][end][type]
parameters.description: Use new for lines added by this commit, otherwise old.

put.description: Resolve/unresolve whole thread of a merge request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: merge_request_iid
parameters.description: The IID of a merge request

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread

parameters.name: resolved
parameters.description: Resolve/unresolve the discussion

post.summary: Add note to existing merge request thread
post.description: Adds a new note to the thread. This can also create a thread from a single comment.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: merge_request_iid
parameters.description: The IID of a merge request

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread note

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of the note/reply

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, such as 2016-03-11T03:45:40Z (requires administrator or project/group owner rights)

put.summary: Modify an existing merge request thread note
put.description: Modify or resolve an existing thread note of a merge request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: merge_request_iid
parameters.description: The IID of a merge request

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread note

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of the note/reply (exactly one of body or resolved must be set

parameters.name: resolved
parameters.description: Resolve/unresolve the note (exactly one of body or resolved must be set

delete.summary: Delete a merge request thread note
delete.description: Deletes an existing thread note of a merge request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: merge_request_iid
parameters.description: The IID of a merge request

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread note

get.description: Gets a list of all discussion items for a single commit.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: commit_id
parameters.description: The ID of a commit

get.description: Returns a single discussion item for a specific project commit

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: commit_id
parameters.description: The ID of a commit

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a discussion item

post.description: Creates a new thread to a single project commit. This is similar to creating a note but other comments (replies) can be added to it later.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: commit_id
parameters.description: The SHA of a commit

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of the thread

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, such as 2016-03-11T03:45:40Z (requires administrator or project/group owner rights)

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position when creating a diff note

parameters.name: position[base_sha]
parameters.description: SHA of the parent commit

parameters.name: position[start_sha]
parameters.description: SHA of the parent commit

parameters.name: position[head_sha]
parameters.description: The SHA of this commit (same as commit_id)

parameters.name: position[position_type]
parameters.description: Type of the position reference, allowed values: text or image

parameters.name: position[new_path]
parameters.description: File path after change

parameters.name: position[new_line]
parameters.description: Line number after change

parameters.name: position[old_path]
parameters.description: File path before change

parameters.name: position[old_line]
parameters.description: Line number before change

parameters.name: position[width]
parameters.description: Width of the image (for image diff notes)

parameters.name: position[height]
parameters.description: Height of the image (for image diff notes)

parameters.name: position[x]
parameters.description: X coordinate (for image diff notes)

parameters.name: position[y]
parameters.description: Y coordinate (for image diff notes)

post.summary: Add note to existing commit thread
post.description: Adds a new note to the thread.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: commit_id
parameters.description: The ID of a commit

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread note

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of the note/reply

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Date time string, ISO 8601 formatted, such 2016-03-11T03:45:40Z (requires administrator or project/group owner rights)

put.summary: Modify an existing commit thread note
put.description: Modify or resolve an existing thread note of a commit.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: commit_id
parameters.description: The ID of a commit

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread note

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of a note

delete.description: Deletes an existing thread note of a commit.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project

parameters.name: commit_id
parameters.description: The ID of a commit

parameters.name: discussion_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: The ID of a thread note
